name: Coin Flip Tool
description: Flip a coin with n sides using true randomness from random.org. Supports custom side names and various meta-usage patterns.
author: Shinkai

sides.description: Number of sides for the coin/die (2-100). For regular coin use 2. Default: 3

items.description: Custom label for a single side (e.g., 'heads', 'tails')

sideNames.description: Custom labels for each side. Array length must equal sides parameter if provided

result.description: The result of the coin flip

error.description: Error message if the flip failed
